title: Bloomberg Markets: Dietze Sees `Puppy Love' for Portfolios
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dietze Sees `Puppy Love' for Portfolios
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David Dietze Founder, President and Chief Investment Strategist Point View Wealth Management Discussing the Dogs of the Dow mean Puppy Love For Your Portfolio. Despite a pricey, aging bull market, long term investors must stay the course. With bond yields incredibly low, investors can’t reach their goals by hunkering down in ten year Treasury bonds yielding just 2.2%.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
